value.value: @replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(string(activity('Get File Structure').output.structure), '[', ''), ']',''), '{"name":"', '['),'","type":"Int32"}', '] int'), '","type":"Int64"}', '] bigint'), '","type":"Decimal"}', '] decimal(38,18)'), '","type":"DateTime"}', '] datetime2'), '","type":"String"}', '] nvarchar(4000)' )

sqlReaderQuery.value:
INSERT INTO DBO.EMP_TAR (EMP_ID,EMP_Name,Salary,Comments,ID)
SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME,Salary,COMMENTS,@{pipeline().parameters.Id} FROM EMP
SELECT 1

value.value: @replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(string(activity('Get Metadata1').output.structure), '[', ''), ']',''), '{"name":"', '['),'","type":"Int32"}', '] int'), '","type":"Int64"}', '] bigint'), '","type":"Decimal"}', '] decimal(38,18)'), '","type":"DateTime"}', '] datetime2'), '","type":"String"}', '] nvarchar(4000)' )

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceExtract
SourceExtract select(mapColumn(
		Address = Column_1
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns
RemoveColumns derive(Name = regexReplace((regexExtract(Address,`(\D+)`,1)),',',' '),
		Street = (regexSplit((regexExtract(Address,`( \d+\D)`,1)),`[,]`)[1])+(regexSplit((regexExtract(Address,`( \D+ )`,1)),`[,]`)[1]),
		City = (regexSplit((regexExtract(Address,`( \D+ )`,1)),`[,]`)[2]),
		ZipCode = (regexSplit((regexExtract(Address,`( \D+\d+)`,1)),`[,]`)[3])) ~> AddressExtract
AddressExtract sink(input(
		Cust_ID as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string,
		State as string,
		Zip as string,
		{Total Revenue} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1

parameters{
	filename as string,
	File_trans_id as string
}
source(output(
		SerialNumber as string,
		SalesOrder as string,
		{Sales Item} as string,
		Material as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UoM as string,
		NetValue as string,
		Currency as string,
		CreationDate as string,
		CreatedBy as string,
		Plant as string,
		DocumentType as string,
		DocumentCategory as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	wildcardPaths:[('Quote/'+$filename)]) ~> source
source(output(
		Serial_Number as string,
		Sales_Order as integer,
		Sales_Item as integer,
		Material as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UoM as string,
		Net_value as string,
		Currency as string,
		Creation_Date as string,
		Created_By as string,
		Plant as string,
		Document_Type as string,
		Document_Category as string,
		Batch_Id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TempRaw
source derive(file_trans_Id = $File_trans_id) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn sink(input(
		Serial_Number as string,
		Sales_Order as integer,
		Sales_Item as integer,
		Material as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UoM as string,
		Net_value as string,
		Currency as string,
		Creation_Date as string,
		Created_By as string,
		Plant as string,
		Document_Type as string,
		Document_Category as string,
		Batch_Id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Serial_Number = SerialNumber,
		Sales_Order = SalesOrder,
		Sales_Item = {Sales Item},
		Material,
		Quantity,
		UoM,
		Net_value = NetValue,
		Currency,
		Creation_Date = CreationDate,
		Created_By = CreatedBy,
		Plant,
		Document_Type = DocumentType,
		Document_Category = DocumentCategory,
		Batch_Id = file_trans_Id
	)) ~> InsertingintoTemp
TempRaw sink(input(
		Serial_Number as string,
		Sales_Order as integer,
		Sales_Item as integer,
		Material as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UoM as string,
		Net_value as string,
		Currency as string,
		Creation_Date as string,
		Created_By as string,
		Plant as string,
		Document_Type as string,
		Document_Category as string,
		Batch_Id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> QuoteUSRaw

source(output(
		Cust_ID as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string,
		State as string,
		Zip as string,
		{Total Revenue} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> BlobSource
BlobSource keyGenerate(output(SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
SurrogateKey aggregate(groupBy(Cust_ID),
	Cust_ID_Count = sum(1),
		SK = max(SK)) ~> Grouping
Grouping, SurrogateKey join(Grouping@SK == SurrogateKey@SK,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Dedup
Dedup select(mapColumn(
		Cust_ID = Grouping@Cust_ID,
		SK = Grouping@SK,
		CustomerName,
		Company_Name,
		Address,
		City,
		Country,
		State,
		Zip,
		{Total Revenue}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
Select sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> sink

source(output(
		Bun as string,
		Created_By as string,
		Creation_Date as string,
		Currency as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Del_Date as string,
		Destination as string,
		Doc_Date as string,
		Document_Category as string,
		Document_Type as string,
		FX_RATE as string,
		GBP_Value as integer,
		Item as integer,
		Job_No as integer,
		Line_item as string,
		Material as string,
		Material_Description as string,
		Net_price as integer,
		Net_value as string,
		Order_qty as string,
		per as long,
		Plant as string,
		Purchase_order_no as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Sales_Item as integer,
		Sales_Item_Description as string,
		Sales_Item_Text as string,
		Sales_Order as integer,
		Serial_Number as string,
		Sold_to_pt as integer,
		UoM as string,
		Batch_Id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RawTransactionTable
RawTransactionTable derive(Customer_Name = case((like(Customer_Name,'Pump%')),'Pumps123 LTD',Customer_Name)) ~> CleansingCustomerNamesPart1
CleansingCustomerNamesPart1 derive(Customer_Name = case((Customer_Name=='Customer 2'),'SPX123 LTD',Customer_Name)) ~> CleansingCustomernamesPart2
CleansingCustomernamesPart2 window(over(Serial_Number),
	asc(Quantity, true),
	Ranking = rowNumber()) ~> CreatingSeperateLineItem
CreatingSeperateLineItem derive(Serial_Number = Serial_Number+'_'+ toString(Ranking)) ~> SplitingSeperateLineItem
SplitingSeperateLineItem sink(input(
		Bun as string,
		Created_By as string,
		Creation_Date as string,
		Currency as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Del_Date as string,
		Destination as string,
		Doc_Date as string,
		Document_Category as string,
		Document_Type as string,
		FX_RATE as string,
		GBP_Value as integer,
		Item as integer,
		Job_No as integer,
		Line_item as string,
		Material as string,
		Material_Description as string,
		Net_price as integer,
		Net_value as string,
		Order_qty as string,
		per as long,
		Plant as string,
		Purchase_order_no as string,
		Quantity as string,
		Sales_Item as integer,
		Sales_Item_Description as string,
		Sales_Item_Text as string,
		Sales_Order as integer,
		SerialNumber as string,
		Sold_to_pt as integer,
		UoM as string,
		Batch_Id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Bun,
		Created_By,
		Creation_Date,
		Currency,
		Customer_Name,
		Del_Date,
		Destination,
		Doc_Date,
		Document_Category,
		Document_Type,
		FX_RATE,
		GBP_Value,
		Item,
		Job_No,
		Line_item,
		Material,
		Material_Description,
		Net_price,
		Net_value,
		Order_qty,
		per,
		Plant,
		Purchase_order_no,
		Quantity,
		Sales_Item,
		Sales_Item_Description,
		Sales_Item_Text,
		Sales_Order,
		SerialNumber = Serial_Number,
		Sold_to_pt,
		UoM,
		Batch_Id
	)) ~> sink
